DOC.brief_summary: This observational study introduced an new advanced bleeding control strategy during complex liver resection.This newly described "stepwise vascular control" technique was efficacious and feasible to control intra-operative bleeding in complex hepatectomy involving second hepatic hilum and retro-hepatic inferior vena cava.
DOC.brief_title: New Techniques to Reduce Intra-operative Bleeding During Complex Liver Resection
DOC.criteria: tumor size is more than 5cm in diameter; these tumor were close to or were compressing main hepatic veins and RIVC directly; PughChild Grade is A or Indocyanine green retention rate at 15min (ICG15%) is less than 10% .
